title: The Mirror Charm
description: Middle Grade Fairy Tale RetellingAvailable only on Wattpad.comDear Diary,Have you ever discovered anything unusual about yourself?Like, I don't know, maybe that magic is real and you're a witch?Oh, and that fairy tales are based on true stories and you're like, the tenth great grand kid of the Evil Queen.  ~ Kiah
author: J.C. Fay
